description: From the russet lake hut head up the col btwn Fissile Peak and Whirlwind Peak.
directions: From the summit of the Flute descend to oboe. From oboe descend to Cowboy ridge.  Ascend Cowboy ridge down to the russet lake hut.  Sleep over. Wake up. Ascend Whirlwind in 2-4 hrs.  Enjoy.
title: Whirlwind Peak
